name: Go Home (RHAESONE)
description:
Go Home is a narrative room escape game that made with Unity and the Fungus plug-in. The plot tells the main character's lost memories and Interpretation of family affection. Player could unfold the plot step by step through the reasoning of the items information in the escape room.

In order to prevent spoilers, I recommended to play the game first and then watch the walk-through video. During the game, it is recommended to try to click on every object in the room to find the answer.

Walk-through Video

Game prop materials are all from the copyright-free material website: https://www.freepik.com/home

Background music:

TRA$H - Memories

park bird - Are You Lost
